review: I like it, I'm satisfied with my purchase.  It is pretty cool now, soon you can connect it to Amazon Fire TV, so it will be like having a sound bar for free.  Plus I think a lot of other cool things are coming.

review: I don't know if I like it or don't actually since i can't get my wifi configured (with no help from my ISP), but I'm sure I will. I've spoken to several other folks who are simply pleased beyond expectation. So . . . I'll keep troubleshooting to enjoy it as well as others.

review: Fast processing, intuitive interface, great ergonomic remote. Good value. Enjoying speedy access to multiple forms of entertainment with music, movies, games and apps.
author: Michele L

review: I wished I have bought this gadget first. It has changed my way of watching tv and I don't rely on my Direct TV service to command what can I watch and when. After this I don't feel I have to keep Direct TV any longer unless the very basic for local news/ The best investment I have made media wise.
author: Ricardo Torres

review: We LOVE, LOVE, LOVE our Fire TV! No more high satellite TV subscriptions for us! Now we get to see what we want, when we want for a fraction of what we paid for satellite! With a couple of very low-cost monthly subscriptions we now have all of the viewing content we could ever want delivered through this magic little box! Thanks, Amazon, for another amazing product! We would highly recommend Fire TV!!
author: Shelley L Lee
